thread.title: Evidence confirms volcanic island collapses may trigger mega-tsunamis (University of Bristol)

author: wn.com
title: Evidence confirms volcanic island collapses may trigger mega-tsunamis (University of Bristol)
text: ( Source : University of Bristol ) Tell-tale boulder and sand deposits record impact of giant wave. Landslide on nearby Fogo island triggered a giant tsunami that inundated Santiago (Cape Verde ), 73, 000 years ago, to date one of the largest
